trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable"></xref> event of a class that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer"></xref> interface.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event when the control has obtained the total number of records of the underlying data source object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control provides an event handler for this event named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnTotalRowCountAvailable%2A>.

This event handler initializes page-related properties and creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPageableItemContainer.TotalRowCountAvailable> event is primarily used by control developers.
For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PageEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs"></xref> class.
You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.
> [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs> class.

|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.StartRowIndex%2A>|The value of the `startRowIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.MaximumRows%2A>|The value of the `maximumRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PageEventArgs.TotalRowCount%2A>|The value of the `totalRowCount` parameter.|
The index of the first record on a page of data.
The maximum number of items to display on each page of data.
The total number of records.
Gets the maximum number of records to display on each page.
The maximum number of records to display on each page.
Gets the index of the first record on a page.
The index of the first record on a page.
Gets the total number of records in the underlying data source.
The total number of records of the underlying data source.
